eventParts.text: Hey, look at this. There are posters everywhere.
Oh, it's posters put up by the soldiers. They're saying that the time has come to fight back against the vultures.
I guess the queen has grown tired of the way the vultures are treating our people.
Is she saying that we have to fight them? That doesn't feel right...
Well, we can't just let the vultures go on like this. We have to do something.

eventConsequence.selectionText: I agree with the queen. I think we have to fight back.
eventConsequence.conclusionText: We can't tolerate the way the vultures are acting. If we have to fight back to make them stop, then that's what we'll do.

eventConsequence.selectionText: I don't agree. I don't think violence is the solution.
eventConsequence.conclusionText: We're all just different types of birds after all. I think we should be able to be friends.
